text: VIP: My Brother Superman (Italian: VIP, mio fratello superuomo) is a 1968 Italian animated film directed by Bruno Bozzetto. It is a parody of superheroes and enjoyed a good commercial and critical success. In 2008 it was produced a spin-off TV-series in 3D animation, PsicoVip. ==Cast== *Oreste Lionello as Mini VIP *Fiorella Betti as Lisa *Micaela Esdra as Nervustrella *Corrado Gaipa as the Colonel *Pino Locchi as Schultz *Lydia Simoneschi as Happy Betty Category:1968 movies Category:Italian movies
title: VIP my Brother Superman
